feed.title: BBBike@World - a Cycle Route Planner
feed.subtitle: BBBike is a route planner for cyclists in Berlin. It is now ported to other cities around the world - thanks to the OpenStreetMap project!

entry.title: The BBBike extract service supports now polygons
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports now polygons

entry.title: The BBBike extract service supports now the Navit format
entry.content: The BBBike extract service supports now the Navit format

entry.title: A new BBBike iPhone app is availble in the iTune store.
entry.content: A new BBBike iPhone app is availble in the iTune store. The city Berlin use the original BBBike data, the other cities are OSM based.

entry.title: Map Compare with new maps: Nokia Map, Terrain, Satellite, Hybrid, Public Transit, Traffic. Map Compare now supports up to 52 maps: http://tile.bbbike.org/mc/
entry.content: Map Compare with new maps: Nokia Map, Terrain, Satellite, Hybrid, Public Transit, Traffic. Map Compare now supports up to 52 maps: http://tile.bbbike.org/mc/

entry.title: New feature: BBBike extract service with Osmand map format #osm #android
entry.content: New feature: BBBike extract service with Osmand map format #osm #android

entry.title: New feature: Map Compare supports up to 32 maps on the screen and a fullscreen mode: http://tile.bbbike.org/mc/
entry.content: Map Compare supports up to 32 maps on the screen and a fullscreen mode: http://tile.bbbike.org/mc/

entry.title: New feature: BBBike extract service with shapefile map format #osm #esri #gis
entry.content: New feature: BBBike extract service with OSM Shape map format

entry.title: A new BBBike Android app (Berlin only, original data) is available in the android market: https://play.google.com/store/search?q=bbbike
entry.content: A new BBBike Android app (Berlin only, original data) is available in the android market: https://play.google.com/store/search?q=bbbike

entry.title: New feature: BBBike extract service with Garmin OSM and Garmin cycle map format
entry.content: New feature: BBBike extract service with Garmin OSM and Garmin cycle map format

entry.title: Added new cities: LaPaz, Cusco, and Sucre
entry.content: Added new cities: LaPaz, Cusco, and Sucre

entry.content: Added Toner and Watercolor maps for http://bbbike.org

entry.title: New feature: start a route search with right click on the map
entry.content: New feature: start search a route with right click on the map

entry.title: New feature: move start or destination pointers from a street marker
entry.content: New feature: move start or destination pointers from a street marker

entry.title: Improve HTML layout, use all available space for map
entry.content: Improve HTML layout, use all available space for map

entry.title: Added new overlay map: Google Panoramio photos
entry.content: Added new overlay map: Google Panoramio photos

entry.title: Added new overlay map: Google Weather
entry.content: Added new overlay map: Google Weather

entry.content: New feature: replay a route on the map

entry.content: Added new overlay maps: Velo and Max Speed

entry.content: Added new map Apple

entry.title: Added new map MapBox
entry.content: Added new map MapBox

entry.title: New service: extract service for OSM data
entry.content: New extract service for OSM data, select your individual area up to 400km x 600km large, http://extract.bbbike.org

entry.title: New feature: new maps Esri and Esri Topo
entry.content: New feature: new maps Esri and Esri Topo

entry.title: New feature: new maps MapQuest and MapQuest Sat
entry.content: New feature: new maps MapQuest and MapQuest Sat

entry.title: New feature: a Land Shading overlay layer (Hills)
entry.content: New feature: a Land Shading overlay layer (Hills)

entry.title: Added OpenCycleMaps Landscape and Transport for http://bbbike.org
entry.content: Added OpenCycleMaps Landscape and Transport for http://bbbike.org

entry.title: Added new cities
entry.content: New city: Wuerzburg

entry.title: New feature: a smoothness layer for streets in Berlin (excellent, good, cobblestones, horrible)
entry.content: New feature: a smoothness layer for streets in Berlin (excellent, good, cobblestones, horrible)

entry.title: New feature: support search for addresses with house numbers and zip code
entry.content: New: support search for addresses with house numbers and zip code

entry.title: New feature: allow to set start and destination of a cycle route with markers on the map
entry.content: New feature: allow to set start and destination of a cycle route with markers on the map

entry.title: Support cycle route search with a via point.
entry.content: Support cycle route search with a via point.

entry.title: Support route search for Point of Interest (POI), for train stations, schools, buildings, restaurants, sights etc.
entry.content: Support route search for Point of Interest (POI), for train stations, schools, buildings, restaurants, sights etc.

entry.title: google maps version 3
entry.content: Fully use google maps version 3 for all maps on http://bbbike.org which enable new features like elevation charts and better support for mobile devices.

entry.content: New: cycle routing for New Dehli and Bombay: http://www.bbbike.org/Bombay and http://www.bbbike.org/NewDehli

entry.title: New: cycle routing for Palma de Majorca
entry.content: Now available - cycle routing for Palma and the island Majorca: http://www.bbbike.org/Palma/

entry.title: More translations to other languages
entry.content: BBBike.org is now available in Danish, German, English, Spanish, French, Croatian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese and Russian

entry.title: New directory layout with shorter URLs
entry.content: BBBike.org has now a new directory layout with a sub-directory for each city, e.g. the new home page for London is http://www.bbbike.org/London

entry.title: Added new cities
entry.content: New cities: Bochum

entry.title: Added new cities
entry.content: New cities: Bern

entry.title: Added new cities
entry.content: New cities: Adelaide, Auckland, Brisbane, Buenos Aires, Canberra, Halifax, Johannesburg, Melbourne, Philadelphia

entry.title: Weather forecast
entry.content: Display weather forecast for the next 4 days in local language.

entry.title: Weather
entry.content: Display current weather conditions in local language.

entry.title: New cities for England
entry.content: New cities: Birmingham, Bristol, Leeds, Liverpool, Manchester, Sheffield

entry.title: New cities for Scotland
entry.content: New cities: Edinburgh, Glasgow

entry.title: Donatations
entry.content: We accecpt donations! ;-) http://bbbike.org/community.html

entry.title: Twitter
entry.content: BBBike is on http://twitter.com/BBBikeWorld!

entry.title: Google Maps v3
entry.content: BBBike supports now google maps version 3 which enable new features like localization and elevation charts.

entry.title: Additional map type terrain
entry.content: Additional map type terrain

entry.title: Redesign of BBBike
entry.content: Redesign of BBBike@world search page.

entry.title: Plotting Street Names
entry.content: The street names will be plotted as you type in Google Maps.

entry.title: More cities supported: Bamberg
entry.content: Added new cities: Bamberg

entry.title: More cities supported
entry.content: Added new cities: Victoria

entry.title: Elevation chart
entry.content: BBBike@World displays the elevation chart for the route.

entry.title: More cities supported
entry.content: Added new cities: Nuernberg, Muenchen, Kiel, Oldenburg, Genf, Warschau, Magdeburg, Posen, Breslau, Kattowitz, and Gleiwitz.

entry.title: New design for BBBike\@world search
entry.content: New design for BBBike@world search

entry.title: New cities for BBBike\@world
entry.content: BBBike@World supports now 125 cities world wide.

entry.title: Updated BBBike\@Berlin packages for MacOS
entry.content: The BBBike@Berlin package for MacOS are updated.

entry.title: OpenSearch search plugins
entry.content: Added support for OpenSearch search plugins for all cities.

entry.title: Slippymap supports cycle map
entry.content: Added support for cycle map layer.
